DOC.brief_summary: To assess tolerability initial safety profile Inotuzumab Ozogamicin ( CMC-544 ) combination Rituximab patient B-Cell Non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma ( NHL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Safety And Tolerability Of Combination Therapy Inotuzumab Ozogamicin ( CMC-544 ) And Rituximab
DOC.criteria: CD20 CD22positive , Bcell NHL progress 1 2 prior therapy . Prior therapy must contain least one dose Rituximab therapy . Patients refractory Rituximab ( refractory = PD treatment within 6 month Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status : 0/ 1 . Patients must receive previous radioimmunotherapy . Patients tolerant Rituximab . Patients must receive chemotherapy , cancer immunosuppressive therapy , growth factor ( except erythropoietin ) , investigational agent within 28 day first dose test article . Candidate potentially curative therapy Subjects must receive previous radioimmunotherapy . Subjects autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplant within last 6 month
